page.title: 11A DAY IN A LUSTON BOY'S LIFE
page.content: At 8.00.am I wake up and get ready for school.For{breakfast}I have Frosties. Soon when I am ready for{school}I go out to wait for my next_door neighbour who takes me to school.At school we play until 8.45.am then we go in.Up until the register is finished we do work or read.Soon it is time for {assembly.}After assembly we do Mental Arithmetic or{Maths.}Playtime is at 10.30.am.After play we do some{English work,soon it is lunchtime.For{lunch}I have sandwiches,crisps,a chocolate biscuit and a drink.After lunch we go {swimming}at the Sydonia Swimming Pool in Leominster.After swimming we talk or play a game of coffeepot or detectives.We go home from school at 3.00.p.m.After school I watch some t.v then have my dinner.I go to bed at 9.00.pm.
